articles.author: Joseph Palmer
articles.title: Why is the US finally treating the World Baseball Classic like a World Cup? - The Guardian
articles.description: Many of the game’s top players have skipped the tournament in the past. But this year teams across the world are fielding strong rosters
articles.content: Theres something different about the lead-up to the World Baseball Classic (WBC) this year. Dont take a writers word for it the players themselves have noticed. The hype is a little bit higher this t… [+7526 chars]
